key_risk_themes: ["Architectural Complexity for Core Requirements (Data Residency, Offline Sync)","Security and Performance at Scale (Firestore Rules & Queries)","Operational Risk of Automated Processes (Data Deletion, Costs)"]
immediate_actions_required: ["Initiate a technical design spike for the multi-region data residency architecture before any implementation begins.","Define and enforce a strict testing and review protocol for all Firestore Security Rules.","Mandate a server-side aggregation strategy for all reporting features to ensure performance at scale."]
